1.title: School Daze - Part 1

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: When the Friendship Map grows bigger to reflect the world beyond Equestria, the Mane Six realize they'll need a way to spread the message of friendship far and wide. Luckily, Twilight knows just what to do - open a School of Friendship.

2.title: School Daze - Part 2

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Twilight must reunite her students to stand up for what's right when the Friendship School gets closed by the EEA.

3.title: The Maud Couple

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Pinkie's bond with her sister is put to the test when Maud dates a pony that Pinkie can't stand.

4.title: Fake It Til You Make It

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Fluttershy vows to look after Rarity's Manehattan boutique while she's away and takes on a series of characters in order to cope with the intimidating clientele.

5.title: Grannies Gone Wild

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Rainbow Dash agrees to accompany Granny Smith and a group of elder ponies to Las Pegasus so she can ride a roller coaster before it closes.

6.title: Surf and/or Turf

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: The Cutie Mark Crusaders are called by the Cutie Map to Mount Aris to help a Hippogriff find where he belongs - either with his seapony or Hippogriff relatives.

7.title: Horse Play

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Princess Celestia's dream of being in a play is fulfilled when Twilight casts her in one, but realizes that her talents lie elsewhere.

8.title: The Parent Map

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: When Starlight Glimmer and Sunburst are called by the Cutie Map to visit their old hometown, they discover that their parents are having a friendship problem.

9.title: Non-Compete Clause

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: Applejack and Rainbow Dash compete with each other to see who gets to be Teacher of the Month.

10.title: The Break Up Breakdown

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: When Big Mac overhears Sugar Belle talking to Mrs. Cake, he starts to believe that Sugar Belle is going to break up with him.

11.title: Molt Down

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: Spike goes through a process that dragons suffer from that might kick him out of the house.

12.title: Marks for Effort

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: The Cutie Mark Crusaders try many attempts to attend Twilight's School of Friendship, despite making it clear that they've already mastered the curriculum.

13.title: The Mean 6

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: When the ponies decide to go on a camping trip, Queen Chrysalis creates evil clones of the Mane 6 to help her steal the Elements of Harmony so she can use their power to get revenge on Starlight.

14.title: Yakity-Sax

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

14.plot: Pinkie Pie develops a new hobby of playing an annoying musical instrument that is popular in Yakyakistan, but every pony in Ponyville is annoyed by it. When her friends tell her to stop playing because she isn't good, she loses her happiness, and now her friends have to try to cheer her up and get her back to normal again.

15.title: A Matter of Principals

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

15.plot: When Twilight leaves Starlight in charge of the School of Friendship, Discord is frustrated that he wasn't asked, so he does what he can to make Starlight's new role impossible.

16.title: The Hearth's Warming Club

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

16.plot: A prank gone wrong ruins preparations on Hearth's Warming Eve, and while Twilight tries to figure out which one of her students is behind it, the students bond over shared memories of home.

17.title: Friendship University

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

17.plot: When Twilight discovers there's another school of friendship, she and Rarity go to investigate and are shocked to discover that Twilight's idol and Pillar of Old Equestria, Starswirl the Bearded, is enrolled at Friendship U.

18.title: The End in Friend

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

18.plot: Rainbow Dash and Rarity try to figure out why they are friends when the two of them have so many differences and can't seem to agree on anything that they both like.

19.title: On the Road to Friendship

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

19.plot: When Trixie is invited to bring her magic show to the far-off land of Saddle Arabia, she can think of nopony better to bring along than her great and powerful assistant, Starlight-but, not all friends are meant to travel together.

20.title: The Washouts

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

20.plot: Scootaloo becomes obsessed with the Washouts, a team of stunt performers, leading Rainbow Dash to fear that she may lose her number-one fan.

21.title: A Rockhoof and a Hard Place

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

21.plot: When Rockhoof, one of the Pillars of Old Equestria, has trouble fitting into the modern world, Twilight Sparkle and her friends try to help him find a new purpose.

22.title: What Lies Beneath

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

22.plot: In this episode, the Young Six cram for Twilight Sparkle's "History of Magic in Equestria" exam when they discover a part of the School of Friendship that no one else knows about.

23.title: Sounds of Silence

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

23.plot: Fluttershy and Applejack journey to the edge of the map on a Friendship Quest to help a group of ponies named Kirin who are so afraid of hurting each other's feelings, they've taken a vow of silence.

24.title: Father Knows Beast

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

24.plot: When a strange dragon crash lands in Ponyville claiming to be Spike's father, Spike is ready to do anything his "dad" says in order to learn how to be a "real" dragon.

25.title: School Raze - Part 1

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

25.plot: When the magic of Equestria mysteriously begins to fail, Twilight leads her friends on a quest for answers, leaving the School of Friendship open to attack from dangerous masterminds.

26.title: School Raze - Part 2

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

26.plot: While Twilight and the rest of the Mane 6 try to escape Tartarus, Cozy Glow furthers her plan to take over the School of Friendship with only Twilight's students and the CMCs to stop her.

1.title: Friendship Is Magic, Part 1 (Mare in the Moon)

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: After being warned of a horrible prophecy, Princess Celestia sends her overly studious student Twilight Sparkle to Ponyville to supervise the preparations for the Summer Sun Celebration and to "make some friends".

2.title: Friendship Is Magic, Part 2 (Elements of Harmony)

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: To stop Nightmare Moon, Twilight Sparkle, Spike and some locals must find the Elements of Harmony.

3.title: The Ticket Master

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Twilight must choose who to give one of her two tickets to the Grand Galloping Gala. Despite their attempts, her friends aren't helping her decide.

4.title: Applebuck Season

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Applejack stubbornly vows to perform the orchard harvest herself, despite driving herself to disruptive exhaustion.

5.title: Griffon the Brush Off

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: A griffon friend of Rainbow Dash comes to visit, but proves to be a cruel bully.

6.title: Boast Busters

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: When a smug magician comes to town, Twilight Sparkle resists her friends' calls to challenge her for fear of seeming like a show-off herself.

7.title: Dragonshy

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Fluttershy must overcome her fears to stop a dragon from filling Ponyville with smoke.

8.title: Look Before You Sleep

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Prim Rarity and straightforward Applejack are forced to spend the night together at Twilight's.

9.title: Bridle Gossip

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: When Twilight Sparkle and her friends come down with bizarre conditions, a mysterious zebra is blamed and pursued.

10.title: Swarm of the Century

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: Just before a royal visit, Ponyville is infested with a cute but destructively ravenous and prolific swarm of insects.

11.title: Winter Wrap Up

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: During Ponyville's annual outdoor spring cleanup, Twilight Sparkle struggles to find a way she can pitch in.

12.title: Call of the Cutie

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: Applejack's little sister Apple Bloom is driven to get a "cutie mark" after most of her classmates receive one.

13.title: Fall Weather Friends

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: Rainbow Dash and Applejack find themselves in an increasingly overheated athletic rivalry.

14.title: Suited for Success

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

14.plot: When Rarity's dressmaking instincts are overruled by her friends' esoteric specifications, the ridiculous results threaten to ruin her prospects with a famous fashion designer.

15.title: Feeling Pinkie Keen

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

15.plot: Twilight Sparkle is obsessively determined to discover the secret of Pinkie Pie's uncannily accurate intuitions.

16.title: Sonic Rainboom

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

16.plot: Rainbow Dash is preparing for the Best Young Flyer competition, so Twilight Sparkle casts a spell that gives Rarity temporary wings and the rest of them the ability to walk on clouds like Pegasi.

17.title: Stare Master

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

17.plot: Fluttershy's ill-considered offer to let the rambunctious Cutie Mark Crusaders sleep over at her house drives her to distraction and then danger.

18.title: The Show Stoppers

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

18.plot: The Cutie Mark Crusaders enter a talent contest, but their refusal to play their individual talents leads to a hilarious disaster.

19.title: A Dog and Pony Show

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

19.plot: When Rarity is kidnapped by Diamond Dogs, she makes them regret it even as her friends try to rescue her.

20.title: Green Isn't Your Color

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

20.plot: Rarity's use of a reluctant Fluttershy as her model to impress a fashion photographer backfires when the photographer only becomes interested in using her friend.

21.title: Over a Barrel

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

21.plot: Twilight Sparkle and her friends find themselves in the middle of a territorial conflict between a pony town and a bison tribe.

22.title: A Bird in the Hoof

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

22.plot: Fluttershy takes it upon herself to treat Princess Celestia's ailing bird without permission.

23.title: The Cutie Mark Chronicles

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

23.plot: The Cutie Mark Crusaders ask Applejack, Fluttershy, Rarity, Twilight, Pinkie, and Rainbow Dash how they got their cutie marks.

24.title: Owl's Well That Ends Well

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

24.plot: When an owl becomes Twilight Sparkle's nighttime assistant to ease Spike's workload, the insecure baby dragon becomes jealous.

25.title: Party of One

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

25.plot: Pinky Pie takes her friends' apparent avoidance of her personally to a manic degree.

26.title: The Best Night Ever

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

26.plot: Twilight Sparkle and her friends finally attend the Grand Galloping Gala, which disastrously doesn't live up to their expectations.

1.title: The Return of Harmony, Part 1

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Discord escapes his imprisonment, steals the Elements of Harmony and sows dissension among Twilight's friends to prevent their recovery.

2.title: The Return of Harmony, Part 2

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Finding that the recovered Elements are powerless with her friends magically corrupted by Discord, Twilight Sparkle must rediscover the truth of her friendship to regain hope.

3.title: Lesson Zero

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Twilight panics when she can't find a lesson about friendship for her weekly letter to the princess.

4.title: Luna Eclipsed

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: It's Nightmare Night in Ponyville, and Princess Luna decides to pay a visit, determined to change her public image for the better.

5.title: Sisterhooves Social

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Sweetie Belle wants to help Rarity out at her shop, but seems to keep messing things up. An upcoming "Sisters" celebration gives her an opportunity to bond with Rarity.

6.title: The Cutie Pox

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Apple Bloom finally gets her cutie mark, but she panics at unexpected second, third, and more cutie marks.

7.title: May the Best Pet Win!

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: In order to choose her first pet, Rainbow Dash hosts a flying race.

8.title: The Mysterious Mare Do Well

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Rainbow Dash's athletic skill and prowess are earning her much recognition from the citizenry of Ponyville. However, she soon finds her skills being trumped by a mysterious masked pony who some have dubbed, Mare-Do-Well.

9.title: Sweet and Elite

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: Rarity is faced with a decision: Stay with her friends or move to the high social life in Canterlot?

10.title: Secret of My Excess

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: It's Spike's birthday, but his excessive greediness causes him to have a large growth spurt that could destroy Ponyville.

11.title: Hearth's Warming Eve

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: Twilight Sparkle and her friends reenact the story of the founding of Equestria.

12.title: Family Appreciation Day

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: Apple Bloom doesn't want Granny Smith to embarrass her by speaking in her class.

13.title: Baby Cakes

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: Pinkie Pie has been asked by Mr. and Mrs. Cake to watch over their twin toddlers, but finds that it may be harder than she thought it would be.

14.title: The Last Roundup

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

14.plot: When Applejack disappears from a Canterlot rodeo competition, her friends set out on a journey throughout Equestria to find her.

15.title: The Super Speedy Cider Squeezy 6000

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

15.plot: The Flim Flam brothers challenge the Apple family to a cider-making contest, and the winner will gain possession of the family's Sweet Apple Acres farm. With their home at stake, the Apples must work together and use all of their cider-making skills to win.

16.title: Read It and Weep

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

16.plot: When Rainbow Dash is stuck in the hospital, she discovers the joys of reading, but tries to hide her new hobby from her friends for fear of being an "egghead" herself.

17.title: Hearts and Hooves Day

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

17.plot: The Cutie Mark Crusaders try to get Cheerilee and Big Macintosh to fall in love with a strong potion, but they quickly regret their actions when some serious side effects arise.

18.title: A Friend in Deed

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

18.plot: Pinkie Pie tries to make friends with Cranky Doodle Donkey, the only Equestrian to refuse her friendship, only to prove an intolerable pest.

19.title: Putting Your Hoof Down

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

19.plot: When Fluttershy becomes tired of being pushed around for too long, she decides to seek some assertiveness training from a self-help guru named Iron Will.

20.title: It's About Time

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

20.plot: When Twilight Sparkle receives a strangely vague warning about impending doom and disaster from her future self, she drives herself nearly mad in an attempt to stall a cataclysmic event, but her uncertainty makes finding answers difficult.

21.title: Dragon Quest

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

21.plot: Spike goes on a journey of self-discovery by joining the "Great Dragon Migration," but a raucous gang of teenage dragons might hold the key to the questions Spike has about his identity.

22.title: Hurricane Fluttershy

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

22.plot: Fluttershy struggles to overcome her fear of public humiliation so she can help Rainbow Dash and the other pegasi create a tornado powerful enough to lift the water required for the rainy season in the cloud-producing city of Cloudsdale.

23.title: Ponyville Confidential

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

23.plot: The Cutie Mark Crusaders start a gossip column under the name Gabby Gums, but find it might not be worth the pain the stories cause other ponies.

24.title: MMMystery on the Friendship Express

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

24.plot: An investigation is ordered after a cake Pinkie Pie is guarding for a contest is ruined on the way to Canterlot.

25.title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 1

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

25.plot: Twilight Sparkle is confused by her conflicting feelings when she finds out her brother, Shining Armor, is marrying Princess Celestia's niece, Cadence.

26.title: A Canterlot Wedding - Part 2

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

26.plot: Shining Armor and Princess Cadence are set to be married, but Twilight Sparkle has just discovered a dark secret about the bride to be.

1.title: The Crystal Empire - Part 1

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Northern Equestria's Crystal Empire has reappeared after being afflicted with a curse that made it vanish for 1,000 years. Princess Celestia asks Twilight Sparkle and her friends to protect the empire from disappearing again.

2.title: The Crystal Empire - Part 2

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: After Princess Celestia commissions her to keep Crystal Empire from vanishing again, Twilight realizes that she must find the missing Crystal Heart in order to restore the empire's reputation and strength before it disappears again.

3.title: Too Many Pinkie Pies

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Overwhelmed with having to choose just one friend to spend time with, Pinkie Pie uses a magic mirror to clone herself.

4.title: One Bad Apple

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: The Cutie Mark Crusaders are crushed when Apple Bloom's cousin, Babs Seed, rejects their invitation to become a fellow Crusader and instead joins Diamond Tiara and Silver Spoon bullying them.

5.title: Magic Duel

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: When Trixie returns to Ponyville, she defeats Twilight and banishes her from town.

6.title: Sleepless in Ponyville

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Rainbow Dash tells scary campfire stories, which give Scootaloo nightmares, but Scootaloo doesn't want to tell anyone about her bad dreams for fear of being made fun of.

7.title: Wonderbolts Academy

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Rainbow Dash receives an invitation to attend the Wonderbolt Academy, but questions whether she is Wonderbolt material.

8.title: Apple Family Reunion

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Granny Smith agrees to let Applejack lead the Apple Family reunion but Applejack loses sight of what is truly important.

9.title: Spike at Your Service

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: After Applejack saves Spike, he insists on fulfilling the Noble Dragon Code by repaying her with excessive help around the farm.

10.title: Keep Calm and Flutter On

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: The Mane Six, especially Fluttershy, are commanded by Princess Celestia to attempt to reform Discord.

11.title: Just for Sidekicks

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: To earn gemstones, Spike persuades the Mane Six to let him take of their pets while they are away at the Crystal Empire.

12.title: Games Ponies Play

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: Twilight Sparkle and her friends are assigned to persuade the Equestria Games inspector to select the Crystal Empire,

13.title: Magical Mystery Cure

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: When Twilight casts a spell that switches her friends' cutie marks and destinies, the only way to reverse the spell is by inventing her own magic.

1.title: Princess Twilight Sparkle: Part 1

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: In this new episode, Twilight is busy adjusting to her new wings and her new role as a princess! Just then before the Summer Sun Celebration, Princess Celestia and Luna go missing. The Everfree Forest starts to take over Equestria without them. It's up to the six friends to discover who is causing all this chaos and along the way, discover the hidden secrets of the Elements Of Harmony.

2.title: Princess Twilight Sparkle: Part 2

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: To solve the mystery of the disasters plaguing Equestria, Twilight Sparkle must explore both the land's past and the Everfree Forest's present situation.

3.title: Castle Mane-ia

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: When most of the Mane Six visit the abandoned Castle of the Princesses for separate reasons, they find it seemingly haunted.

4.title: Daring Don't

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Rainbow Dash and friends offer to help their favorite author finish her latest book.

5.title: Flight to the Finish

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Scootaloo wants to participate in the Equestria Games, but after some discouraging words by Diamond Tiara and Silver Spoon regarding her small wings, she worries that Ms. Harshwhinny might not pick her.

6.title: Power Ponies

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: When Spike and the Mane 6 are literally sucked into a magic superhero comic book, they have to play out its main characters' story to be released.

7.title: Bats!

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: When Fluttershy is pressured to help forcefully deal with a vampire fruit bat infestation, the plan's results backfire horrifically.

8.title: Rarity Takes Manehattan

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Rarity's participation in a big city fashion competition becomes distressful when an old friend turned competitor takes advantage of her generosity to plagiarize her work.

9.title: Pinkie Apple Pie

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: When Pinkie Pie suspects she is distantly related to the Apple family, the clan invites her on an unexpectedly arduous trip to investigate the notion.

10.title: Rainbow Falls

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: Rainbow Dash is heading to the Equestria Games trials with the Ponyville Relay Team. How will she react when offered the chance to join the competitive Cloudsdale team instead?

11.title: Three's a Crowd

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: Twilight finally gets to spend some quality time with her sister-in-law, Cadance, or so she thought. A sick friend, needing her help, means things do not go according to plan.

12.title: Pinkie Pride

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: A party planner named Cheese Sandwich is hired to plan the party for Rainbow Dash's "birth-aversary," leaving Pinkie Pie feeling rejected.

13.title: Simple Ways

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: When a visiting travel writer shuns Rarity for the uninterested Applejack, the fashionista jealously imitates her friend's rustic ways over Applejack's protests.

14.title: Filli Vanilli

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

14.plot: After the Ponytones' bass singer loses his voice, Fluttershy is determined to have the show go on.

15.title: Twilight Time

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

15.plot: The Cutie Mark Crusaders abuse their mentorship with Twilight to gain more popularity.

16.title: It Ain't Easy Being Breezies

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

16.plot: Fluttershy agrees to take care of magical creatures, but they prove to be more of a burden than she realized.

17.title: Somepony to Watch Over Me

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

17.plot: Applebloom tries to prove to Applejack that she doesn't need her to constantly watch over her.

18.title: Maud Pie

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

18.plot: When Pinkie introduces her visiting sister, the others find they can't relate to that sibling's completely different personality.

19.title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

19.plot: Princess Luna visits Sweetie Bellle in her dreams after she purposely ruins one of Rarity's dresses.

20.title: Leap of Faith

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

20.plot: Applejack has doubts about a new cure tonic made by the Flim Flam Brothers, until Granny Smith uses it and she is healed.

21.title: Testing, Testing, 1, 2, 3

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

21.plot: Rainbow Dash faces an important intellectual Wonderbolts Reserves entrance test, but her friends find helping her study a frustrating struggle.

22.title: Trade Ya

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

22.plot: The girls test how valuable their friendship is after a trip to the Rainbow Falls Traders Exchange goes awry.

23.title: Inspiration Manifestation

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

23.plot: Spike finds a spell to help Rarity recover from a creative block, which has good and bad effects.

24.title: Equestria Games

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

24.plot: Spike tries to prove he is a brave enough dragon to light the Equestria Games torch.

25.title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

25.plot: Celestia orders Discord to hunt down a villain who escaped from Tartarus, giving Twilight a chance to open the chest from the Tree of Harmony.

26.title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

26.plot: The Princesses transmit their remaining power into Twilight as a last ditch effort to save Equestria.

1.title: The Cutie Map: Part 1

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Twilight Sparkle and friends follow a map to a pseudo-Utopian village where the inhabitants have given up their cutie marks. At first glance, the ponies of this village seem happy, but when the Mane Six investigate further, they realize that the village leader Starlight Glimmer has a sinister view of friendship and individuality.

2.title: The Cutie Map: Part 2

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Stripped of their cutie marks and held prisoner, the Mane 6 must find a way to thwart their conformist enemy.

3.title: Castle Sweet Castle

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Twilight is uncomfortable with her new home since she misses her destroyed library.

4.title: Bloom & Gloom

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Apple Bloom's anxiety over getting her Cutie Mark gives her a bizarrely frightening series of nightmares.

5.title: Tanks for the Memories

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Rainbow Dash tries to keep Winter from coming, after she realizes that Tank must sleep for the entire season.

6.title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: The Cutie Mark Crusaders set out on saving a rodeo in Appleloosa from the infamous outlaw, Troubleshoes Clyde.

7.title: Make New Friends But Keep Discord

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Discord tries not to be jealous when Fluttershy brings a different friend to the Grand Galloping Gala.

8.title: The Lost Treasure of Griffonstone

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Conflicting ideas ensue when Rainbow Dash and Pinkie Pie arrive in the city of Griffonstone.

9.title: Slice of Life

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: As the Mane Six battle a monster, the rest of Ponyville rushes to make it in time for a wedding.

10.title: Princess Spike

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: When Spike is put in charge of making sure nothing disturbs princess Twilight, the power soon goes to his head and he begins making decisions in her name.

11.title: Party Pooped

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: When a serious and important friendship summit takes a dreadful turn, it is up to Pinkie Pie to save the day.

12.title: Amending Fences

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: After reminiscing about her Canterlot days, Twilight realizes that she left for Ponyville without really saying goodbye to her old friends, and tries to reconnect and re-open friendships lost.

13.title: Do Princesses Dream of Magic Sheep?

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: Princess Luna enlists the Mane Six to hunt down a magical force that turns dreams into nightmares.

14.title: Canterlot Boutique

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

14.plot: Rarity's dream of owning a boutique in Canterlot finally comes true, but it comes at a price Rarity may not be willing to pay.

15.title: Rarity Investigates!

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

15.plot: Rarity must prove that her friend is innocent when Rainbow Dash is accused of a crime that she did not commit.

16.title: Made in Manehattan

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

16.plot: Applejack and Rarity are called to Manehattan to solve a friendship problem. They find themselves helping Coco Pommel with a major project in her neighborhood, but the three soon discover that they've bitten off more than they can chew.

17.title: Brotherhooves Social

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

17.plot: When Applejack is called away and has to miss participating in the Sisterhooves Social with Apple Bloom, Big Mac decides to fill in for her.

18.title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

18.plot: After the CMC help defeat Diamond Tiara in the school class president election, they discover a reason to help her.

19.title: The One Where Pinkie Pie Knows

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

19.plot: Pinkie Pie must try and contain a secret involving Princess Cadance and Shining Armor.

20.title: Hearthbreakers

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

20.plot: The Apple family is invited to Pinkie's family for Hearthswarming Eve, only to find that their way of celebrating the holiday seems impossible to understand.

21.title: Scare Master

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

21.plot: Fluttershy decides to face her fears and participate in Nightmare Night with her friends.

22.title: What About Discord?

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

22.plot: After a period of seclusion in her castle's library, Twilight Sparkle finds her friends strangely chummier with Discord.

23.title: The Hooffields and McColts

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

23.plot: Twilight Sparkle and Fluttershy are called upon by the Cutie Map to settle a bitter family feud.

24.title: The Mane Attraction

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

24.plot: Applejack discovers that a visiting rock star is an old friend of hers, but also is dominated by an unscrupulous manager.

25.title: The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 1

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

25.plot: Starlight Glimmer casts a time travel spell as a new plot for revenge against Twilight Sparkle.

26.title: The Cutie Re-Mark - Part 2

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

26.plot: Twilight Sparkle tracks down Starlight Glimmer in the past and tries to find a way to stop her revenge plot.

1.title: The Crystalling - Part 1

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: The Mane Six are introduced to Cadance and Shining Armor's new foal; Twilight gives Starlight a friendship lesson.

2.title: The Crystalling - Part 2

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Eternal winter makes its way to the Crystal Empire; Starlight struggles to reunite with her old friend.

3.title: The Gift of the Maud Pie

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Rarity and Pinkie Pie are both excited to arrive in Manehattan. While Rarity is planning to spend her day finding the ideal location to open a new boutique, Pinkie Pie is excited to be with her sister, Maud, for their annual Pie Sister Surprise Swap Day. Since Pinkie is convinced her sister is better at giving gifts than her, she's excited she finally found Maud the perfect gift - a rock pouch for her pet rock, Boulder. But the problem is she can't get to the store and buy the pouch without ruining the surprise for Maud. Rarity offers to help by leading a tour of the ...

4.title: On Your Marks

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: With their goal achieved, the Cutie Mark Crusaders, especially Apple Bloom, are at a loss of what to do next with their lives.

5.title: Gauntlet of Fire

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Summoned to the Dragon Lands, Spike must compete for the title of Dragon Lord.

6.title: No Second Prances

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Starlight Glimmer excitedly introduces her new friend to Princess Twilight Sparkle, but Twilight is shocked to learn it's Trixie.

7.title: Newbie Dash

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: After Rainbow Dash achieves her dream of becoming a Wonderbolt, she makes a disastrous first impression and gets saddled with a mortifying nickname.

8.title: A Hearth's Warming Tail

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Starlight Glimmer has a case of the holiday blues, so Twilight tries to help cure her by reading one of her favorite Hearth Warming's Eve stories, A Hearth's Warming Tale.

9.title: The Saddle Row Review

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: When Rarity opens her flagship store in Manehattan, a tell-all article threatens to expose how badly her friends almost ruined the Grand Opening.

10.title: Applejack's "Day" Off

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: Rarity struggles to get Applejack to relax at the spa; when Twilight and Spike attempt to take over Applejack's simple farm chores, it turns out to be a more difficult job than they thought.

11.title: Flutter Brutter

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: Fluttershy must help her obnoxious and insecure slacker brother, Zephyr Breeze, shape up.

12.title: Spice Up Your Life

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: Pinkie Pie and Rarity discover a father and daughter struggling to keep their family restaurant open, which is causing tension in their relationship.

13.title: Stranger Than Fan Fiction

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: While attending a convention, Rainbow Dash meets a pony who hates Daring Do as much as she loves it.

14.title: The Cart Before the Ponies

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

14.plot: The Cutie Mark Crusaders get the chance to race in the annual Applewood Derby; their teammates Rarity, Applejack, and Rainbow Dash take over the competition.

15.title: 28 Pranks Later

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

15.plot: Rainbow Dash's excessive pranking gets out of hand; the ponies decide to give her a taste of her own medicine.

16.title: The Times They Are a Changeling

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

16.plot: When Spike travels with Twilight and Starlight back to the Crystal Empire to visit Flurry Heart, they discover the entire empire in a panic due to the reported presence of Changeling spy.

17.title: Dungeons & Discords

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

17.plot: When the Mane 6 leave town, Discord decides to join Spike and Big Mac's "top secret" guys' night. But much to Discord's dismay, it turns out to be an evening of fantasy role playing.

18.title: Buckball Season

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

18.plot: Pinkie Pie and Fluttershy turn out to be Ponyville's best buckball players; Applejack and Rainbow Dash agree to coach them against Appleoosa.

19.title: The Fault in Our Cutie Marks

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

19.plot: An enthusiastic young griffin asks the Crusaders to help her get her very own Cutie Mark; the Crusaders encounter a seemingly impossible problem.

20.title: Viva Las Pegasus

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

20.plot: The Cutie Map sends Applejack and Fluttershy to Las Pegasus, where they once again run into the Flim Flam brothers.

21.title: Every Little Thing She Does

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

21.plot: After missing out on some friendship lessons, Starlight Glimmer tries to impress Twilight Spakrle by tackling some friendship problems at once.

22.title: P.P.O.V. (Pony Point of View)

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

22.plot: Twilight Sparkle gets different accounts of what happened on a boat trip between Applejack, Rarity and Pinkie Pie.

23.title: Where the Apple Lies

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

23.plot: When Apple Bloom tells a white lie to cover up a mistake, Applejack shares the story of how she came to value honesty.

24.title: Top Bolt

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

24.plot: Twilight Sparkle and Rainbow Dash are called to the Wonderbolt Academy by the Cutie Map to help academy hopefuls Sky Stinger and Vapor Trail with a friendship problem.

25.title: To Where and Back Again - Part 1

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

25.plot: Starlight Glimmer went back to the old town to join the sunset festival, but when she got home she found out her friends and the princesses were replaced by changelings. Trixie Discord and Thorax joins her on this mission.

26.title: To Where and Back Again - Part 2

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

26.plot: Having found the Changeling hive Starlight Glimmer, Trixie, Thorax and Discord hunt through its corridors to rescue the princesses and Starlight's friends from Queen Chrysalis.

1.title: Celestial Advice

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Twilight Sparkle agonizes over Starlight Glimmer's future, so she receives some helpful advice from her mentor, Princess Celestia.

2.title: All Bottled Up

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Starlight loses Twilight's friendship map while the Mane Six are on a friendship retreat.

3.title: A Flurry of Emotions

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Twilight agrees to babysit Flurry Heart, however she finds it hard to keep the title of "World's Greatest Aunt" when she plans a jam packed day.

4.title: Rock Solid Friendship

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: When Pinkie Pie learns that Maud might move to Ponyville, she does everything she can to make sure her sister sees that it has more to offer than just rocks.

5.title: Fluttershy Leans In

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Fluttershy is determined to make her career dreams come true with the help of some very special ponies. But when her true vision is not being executed properly, she must find a way to stand up and fight for her ideas.

6.title: Forever Filly

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: When Rarity surprises Sweetie Belle by spending a day together doing all of her favorite activities, Rarity quickly starts to realize that her little sister, having grown and changed is no longer the little foal that she is used to be.

7.title: Parental Glideance

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: When Rainbow Dash's parents discover she's a Wonderbolt, they show up at every event to cheer her on. However, their unabashed enthusiasm proves to be rather embarrassing and pushes Rainbow Dash to the brink.

8.title: Hard to Say Anything

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: The Cutie Mark Crusaders figured out that Big Mac has his first crush and vow to help him win Sugar Belle's heart against the competition of Feather Bangs.

9.title: Honest Apple

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: Rarity persuades Applejack to become a judge for a fashion show, but her blunt practical sensibilities cause friction.

10.title: A Royal Problem

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: Starlight Glimmer is sent to solve a friendship problem between Princess Celestia and Princess Luna; when it's clear that the problem is that the royal sisters don't appreciate one another, Starlight impulsively switches their cutie marks!

11.title: Not Asking for Trouble

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: Pinkie heads to Yakyakistan to attend a festival, but when she tries to get help after Yakyakistan gets covered in snow the yaks refuse.

12.title: Discordant Harmony

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: When Discord invites Fluttershy to his realm for tea, he worries she won't be comfortable there and begins to change it and himself with disastrous results.

13.title: The Perfect Pear

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: Applejack and her siblings discover a few surprises when they set out to unravel the mystery of the feud between the Apple and Pear families.

14.title: Fame and Misfortune

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

14.plot: Ponies begin to argue over who wrote the best lesson after Twilight publishes her friendship journal.

15.title: Triple Threat

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

15.plot: Fearing that they may not get along, Spike does everything he can to prevent Ember and Thorax from meeting each other after he accidentally invites them both to Ponyville.

16.title: Campfire Tales

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

16.plot: When their sister camping trip is ruined by Fly-ders, Applejack, Rarity, and Rainbow Dash tell Sweetie Belle, Apple Bloom, and Scootaloo the stories of their favorite legends; inspired by the tales, the girls make the most out of their new situation.

17.title: To Change a Changeling

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

17.plot: Starlight Glimmer and Trixie try to get Thorax's brother Pharynx to accept the new way by sharing love and transforming so he doesn't undermine Thorax's leadership, and that the hive will ultimately accept him.

18.title: Daring Done?

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

18.plot: After discovering that the author of her favorite book series is retiring, Rainbow Dash has Pinkie Pie go on a quest to see if Daring Do is truly done with adventuring.

19.title: It Isn't the Mane Thing About You

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

19.plot: Rarity must fix her mane in time for a photo shoot after she accidentally uses a potion from Zecora that removes most of her mane and tail.

20.title: A Health of Information

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

20.plot: Fluttershy does everything she can to take care of Zecora when she is ill.

21.title: Marks and Recreation

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

21.plot: The CMC decide to form a camp for blank flanks, but they find out that one of the campers doesn't want a cutie mark.

22.title: Once Upon a Zeppelin

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

22.plot: After finding out that the cruise she's on is a vacation experience, Twilight must figure out how to spend time with both her family and the cruise attendees.

23.title: Secrets and Pies

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

23.plot: Pinkie tries to find out if Rainbow Dash actually ate any of the pies she has baked for her.

24.title: Uncommon Bond

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

24.plot: Starlight is looking forward with a visit from Sunburst but finds out he has more in common with her friends than her.

25.title: Shadow Play - Part 1

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

25.plot: When Sunburst discovers the long-lost journal of Star Swirl, Twilight makes it her mission to save her magical idol from a limbo-like prison.

26.title: Shadow Play - Part 2

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

26.plot: With Star Swirl and the other Pillers of Equestria freed from limbo, Twilight and the others must team up to defeat the Pony of Shadows.

1.title: Episode #9.1

episode of.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: In the land of Equestria, a precocious but introverted bookworm named Twilight Sparkle is the personal protégé of its ruler, Princess Celestia. Sent to Ponyville to oversee a celebration, Twilight faces the return of a menace she feared and defeats it with the power of friendship she discovers with some locals. Now charged to learn more, Twilight and her new friends face life's challenges from personal problems to grave threats to the land with a growing appreciation of the friendship they share and the magic it makes possible.
imdb.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic
plot: After learning that her friends, as well as herself, are the magical Elements of Harmony, studious unicorn Twilight Sparkle is sent by her mentor, Princess Celestia, to Ponyville to study the magic of friendship with help from her friends.::Anonymous

In the land of Equestria, a precocious but introverted bookworm named Twilight Sparkle is the personal protégé of its ruler, Princess Celestia. Sent to Ponyville to oversee a celebration, Twilight faces the return of a menace she feared and defeats it with the power of friendship she discovers with some locals. Now charged to learn more, Twilight and her new friends face life's challenges from personal problems to grave threats to the land with a growing appreciation of the friendship they share and the magic it makes possible.::Kenneth Chisholm (kchishol@rogers.com)

The unicorn Twilight Sparkle is sent by her mentor Princess Celestia to Ponyville. While Twilight is there she meets her new friends Fluttershy, Pinkie Pie, Rarity, Rainbow Dash and, Apple Jack. Now Twilight has an adventure if her own with her new friends in Equestria.

Twilight Sparkle, a unicorn in Equestria. Is sent to Ponyville by her mentor Princess Celestia. There she meets Pinkie Pie, AppleJack, Fluttershy, Rainbow Dash, and Rarity. Together, they help Twilight and each other the Magic of Friendship.
synopsis: In the magical land of Equestria, a kingdom populated only by colorful ponies, TWILIGHT SPARKLE, a studious and slightly reclusive young unicorn intent only on enhancing her magical abilities, has been assigned by her mentor, PRINCESS CELESTIA, a very important task: get your muzzle out of those books and make some friends! In the quaint, fairytale village of PONYVILLE, TWILIGHT SPARKLE meets 5 new ponies, and through funny, offbeat experiences and exciting, enchanted adventures, they teach her about the most powerful magic of all: the magic of friendship!
